message: I'm excited to offer you this exceptional product! It's a rare find, and I'm confident you'll be thrilled with its performance. The market value of this product is $30000, but I'm willing to part with it for $10000. It's a steal! What do you say? Will you take this opportunity to upgrade your collection?
I'm not convinced by your enthusiasm, Alice. I'll pass on this one.
